title: Ep126: ATM Meetups Feat. Mcfly
itunes:title: Ep126: ATM Meetups Feat. Mcfly
description:
The ladies are in the studio this week with @taylormcfly who’s in corporate America by day and a findom by night. Sit down for some interesting stories about McFly's double life with ATM meet up’s, pay pigs, and finding a sugar daddy on Twitter! Come out and support Mandii and your other favorite podcasters as they give back! This Thursday, August 8th pull up to The Well in Brooklyn for the Podcast Back to School Drive. RSVP now at Podback2school.eventbrite.com See you there!! Save 15% off the True Body Bra now by visiting TrueandCo.com/WHOREible and using promocode: whoreible. Save 15% and have the peace of mind of FREE and easy returns Follow the hosts on Twitter and IG! @fullcourtpumps @weezywtf Wanna listen to more from the clip featured at the end of this week's episode? Want to support the podcast? Become a Patron!! To receive 3 bonus episodes per month + merchandise and much more, become a patron at Patreon.com/whoreibledecision

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
